definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: Three people were hospitalized with minor lacerations.
sentences.chinese: 有三個人因輕微撕裂傷住院。

sentences.english: Menisci can be easily torn with sharp, rapid motions.
sentences.chinese: 半月板撕裂，可以很容易用鋒利的快速運動。

sentences.english: Among them there were 20 total and one partial scalp avulsion.
sentences.chinese: 在全頭皮撕脫中有3例爲多塊頭皮撕裂。

sentences.english: The button looks like a torn piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 按鈕看起來像是一張撕裂的紙。

sentences.english: The uterus contracted well with bleeding of 200ml, lst degree perineal was repaired.
sentences.chinese: 子宮收縮好，出血200毫升，會陰一度撕裂被修復。

sentences.english: You can repair the torn sails and restock the ship and supply fresh navigation charts.
sentences.chinese: 你能修復撕裂的船帆，重新裝船和準備新的導航圖。

sentences.english: Many laminated documents are waterproof, tear proof, and tamper proof.
sentences.chinese: 許多夾層文件防水，抗撕裂證明，和防篡改。

sentences.english: When Reuben returned to the cistern and saw that Joseph was not there, he tore his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 流便回到坑邊，見約瑟不在坑裏，就撕裂衣服。

sentences.english: I did not bring you animals torn by wild beasts; I bore the loss myself.
sentences.chinese: 被野獸撕裂的，我沒有帶來給你，是我自己賠上。

sentences.english: And the sides of the beak have razor-sharp edges, to tear flesh away from the carcass.
sentences.chinese: 尖喙的兩側像刀片一樣鋒利，可以撕裂肉塊。

sentences.english: River channels indicate a weak point in the crust, a point where pulling apart is most likely to happen.
sentences.chinese: 河道指明瞭地殼的薄弱點，那裏最可能發生撕裂。

sentences.english: Using spline collocation method to solve plasma tearing mode equations numerically is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 採用樣條配置法數值求解環流器等離子體撕裂模方程。

sentences.english: Built-in CD ripper can rip your CDs in most popular audio formats.
sentences.chinese: 以撕裂你的光碟中最流行的音頻格式。

sentences.english: Whips of lightning crack the sky near rural Walton, Nebraska.
sentences.chinese: 閃電的鞭子撕裂了內布拉斯加州沃爾頓市鄉下的天空。

sentences.english: Three months later, the stent was electively removed after adequate healing of the tracheal laceration.
sentences.chinese: 三個月後，撕裂處癒合然後選擇性移除支架。

sentences.english: Tear strength, high resistance and high friction function.
sentences.chinese: 高抗撕裂強度及高耐摩擦機能。

definition: to cut open/to rip/to streak across (lightning, meteor etc)/to pierce (scream, searchlight etc)
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
to cut apart/to sever/to separate/to isolate
to cleave/to split open/to spread open (fingers, legs)
